Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
Thanks to our lady, we maids are provided with
more than adequate diets. We must be certain to
thoroughly express our gratitude to her.

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
We maids must mind our manners, even during
our own private mealtime. When a new maid
arrives, manners are the first thing we teach.

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
What brings you here at this hour of the night?

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
This is where our lady eats. It must be kept
clean at all times, lest we incur her wrath.

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
What is my opinion on...our lady's behavior?
You think her...selfish? I've never even
considered such a thing...

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
Do what your master tells you. That is the
essence of maidhood.

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
Our lady gets lonely quite easily, if you'd believe
it.

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
I believe our lady smiles more widely these days
than before.

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
Our lady doesn't scold us as much as she did
previously. I believe this is a sign of growth both
for us and for her.

<NAME_MOB_TANNENBERG>
In the past, maids have served our lady whilst
appearing visibly shaken, as if she terrified them.
<PAGE>
Such mannerisms are very rude to the master,
however. That is absolutely not proper maidly
behavior.
